forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 9C. E winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 48F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some passing clouds. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 3C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 37F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High near 50F. S winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 52F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
